Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32.details: Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._

RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}.

RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params.admin: The address of the new admin

params._additionalFunds: Additional funds for calculating the coverage

returns.isInsufficientDepositAmount: The boolean if the lent amount in the selected currency is insufficient for the deposit amount or not

returns.liquidatorFee: Liquidation fee amount received by liquidators
returns.protocolFee: Liquidation fee amount received by protocol

deposit(bytes32,uint256).details: Deposits funds by the caller into collateral.

depositFrom(address,bytes32,uint256).details: Deposits funds by the `from` into collateral.

depositTo(bytes32,uint256,address).details: Deposits funds by the caller into collateral.

params._onBehalfOf: The beneficiary of the supplied deposits

depositWithPermitFrom(address,bytes32,ui.details: Deposits funds by the `from` into collateral with transfer approval of asset via permit function

params._deadline: The deadline timestamp that the permit is valid
params._permitR: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params._permitS: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params._permitV: The V parameter of ERC712 permit sig

depositWithPermitTo(bytes32,uint256,addr.details: Deposits funds by the caller into collateral with transfer approval of asset via permit function

params._deadline: The deadline timestamp that the permit is valid
params._onBehalfOf: The beneficiary of the supplied deposits
params._permitR: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params._permitS: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params._permitV: The V parameter of ERC712 permit sig

returns._0: Array of the currency accepted as collateral

returns.totalCollateral: The total collateral amount in the base currency
returns.totalDeposit: The total deposit amount in the base currency
returns.totalUsedCollateral: The total used collateral amount in the base currency

returns.liquidationAmount: The the amount to be liquidated

returns.liquidationProtocolFeeRate: The liquidation fee received by liquidators
returns.liquidatorFeeRate: The liquidation protocol fee received by protocol

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns.totalCollateralAmount: The total collateral amount in the base currency

returns._0: The total amount of unused collateral
Maximum amount of the base currency that can be withdrawn
Maximum amount of the selected currency that can be withdrawn

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

initialize(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._liquidationProtocolFeeRate: The liquidation fee rate received by protocol
params._liquidatorFeeRate: The liquidation fee rate received by liquidators
params._nativeToken: The address of wrapped token of native currency
params._owner: The address of the contract owner
params._resolver: The address of the Address Resolver contract

returns._0: The boolean if the currency has been registered or not

returns.isCollateralCurrencies: Array of the boolean if the currency has been registered or not

returns.isEnoughCollateral: The boolean if the user has enough collateral or not
returns.isEnoughDepositInOrderCcy: The boolean if the user has enough deposit in the order currency or not

returns._0: The boolean if the currency has been registered or not

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._isCollateral: Boolean if the selected currency is acceptable as collateral.
params._tokenAddress: Token contract address of the selected currency

params.admin: The address of the admin to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.account: The address of the account to revoke the role from

requiredContracts().details: The contract name list is in `./libraries/Contracts.sol`.

params.account: The address of the account to revoke the role from

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._isCollateral: Boolean if the selected currency is acceptable as collateral.

params._liquidationProtocolFeeRate: The liquidation fee rate received by protocol
params._liquidatorFeeRate: The liquidation fee rate received by liquidators

addOperator(address).notice: Adds a new admin as Operator

calculateCoverage(address,(bytes32,uint2.notice: Calculates the collateral rate used when additional funds are had by the user.

calculateLiquidationFees(uint256).notice: Gets the actual fee amounts calculated by rates.

cleanUpUsedCurrencies(address,bytes32).notice: Clean up the used currencies of the user.

executeForcedReset(address,bytes32).notice: Forces a reset of the user's deposit amount.

getBorrowableAmount(address,bytes32).notice: Gets the borrowable amount in the selected currency.

getCollateralAmount(address,bytes32).notice: Gets the total collateral amount of the selected currency.

getCollateralCurrencies().notice: Gets the currencies accepted as collateral

getCoverage(address).notice: Gets the rate of collateral used.

getDepositAmount(address,bytes32).notice: Gets the amount deposited in the user's collateral.

getLiquidationAmount(address,bytes32,uin.notice: Gets the amount to be liquidated.

getRevision().notice: Gets the revision number of the contract

getTotalDepositAmount(bytes32).notice: Gets the total amount deposited of the selected currency

getTotalUnusedCollateralAmount(address).notice: Gets the total amount of the unused collateral in the base currency

getUsedCurrencies(address).notice: Gets the currencies that the user used as collateral.

getWithdrawableCollateral(address).notice: Gets the maximum amount of the base currency that can be withdrawn from user collateral.

getWithdrawableCollateral(bytes32,addres.notice: Gets the maximum amount of the selected currency that can be withdrawn from user collateral.

isCollateral(bytes32).notice: Gets if the currency is acceptable as collateral

isCollateral(bytes32[]).notice: Gets if the currencies are acceptable as collateral

isCovered(address,bytes32).notice: Gets if the collateral is sufficient or not

isRegisteredCurrency(bytes32).notice: Gets if the currency has been registered

registerCurrency(bytes32,address,bool).notice: Registers new currency and sets if it is acceptable as collateral.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).notice: Revokes `role` from the calling account. This function is disabled by overriding it with a revert.

requiredContracts().notice: Returns the contract names used in this contract.

transferFrom(bytes32,address,address,uin.notice: Transfers the token from sender to receiver.

updateCurrency(bytes32,bool).notice: Updates the currency if it is acceptable as collateral.

withdraw(bytes32,uint256).notice: Withdraws funds by the caller from unused collateral.

userdoc.notice: Implements the management of the token in each currency for users. This contract manages the following data related to tokens. - Deposited token amount as the collateral - Parameters related to the liquidation   - Liquidation threshold rate   - Liquidation fee rate received by protocol   - Liquidation fee rate received by liquidators
